It's certified to Hirata Hikozo, one of the cornerstones of Higo.  His best work is absolutely first rate and much more expensive.  Why does a sketch attributed to a famous artist bring more than a fully realized work by an also-ran?

Jim 

  Can someone explain why the 6th tsuba on this page is $12500? It does
  not look that special to me, even if someone famous made it? 

  - Matt
